Hello,
I looked at the JUnitFAQ.txt uploaded on yahoo, but couldn't find
in=
formation about the existence (and utility) of private methods, as
also of =
db testing/sql testing etc. Am I looking at an older version, or
is there a=
 different document with this information? In case there
isn't, I wouldn't =
mind going through the archive, collecting the
opinions, and adding them in=
 there if it makes sense.
Thanks,
Nilesh

 ?

g
